original_title: Joint Chiefs Gen. Caine hosts NATO allies to discuss Ukraine security guarantees | Fox News
article_summary: U.S. and European military leaders discuss potential security guarantees for Ukraine to prevent Russian aggression, following President Trump's suggestion of air support and in anticipation of a Putin-Zelenskyy meeting. The discussions are taking place ahead of a NATO Chiefs of Defense meeting, where allied military leaders will coordinate next steps to end the Russian war in Ukraine.</s>
